description:
A pleasure cruise turns into a nightmare! Someone is after the Sword of Light, and Lina, Pokota, and the rest might not survive to see dry land unless they can identify the hidden assassin - or is it assassins?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Town Scape: Hito ni Tsukurareta Mono Yue ni
Town scape 人に作られたモノゆえに
